Class WritableSharedFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • java.io.BufferedInputStream
          • javax.mail.util.SharedFileInputStream
            • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.thundermbox.WritableSharedFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.mail.internet.SharedInputStream

    class WritableSharedFile
extends javax.mail.util.SharedFileInputStream
    A subclass of SharedFileInputStream that also allows writing.

    • Field Summary
